alldb.table_sql: SELECT P.ID, P.EQUIP_NAME AS EQUIPNAME, P.MODEL_ AS MODEL, P.EQUIP_NUM AS EQUIPNUM, P.PRICE AS PRICE, P.EQUIP_PRICE AS EQUIPPRICE, P.TOTAL, P.NOWTOTAL, P.BRAND_ AS BRAND, P.VNDR AS VNDR, CI3.CUST_NAME AS VNDRNAME, P.MANUFACTURER AS MANUFACTURER, CI2.CUST_NAME AS MANUFACTURERNAME, P.DEVICE_TYPE AS DEVICETYPE, DICT.NAME_ AS DEVICETYPENAME, P.EQUIP_DELIVERY_PLACE AS EQUIPDELIVERYPLACE, P.EQUIP_DELIVERY_DATE AS EQUIPDELIVERYDATE, P.EQUIP_PLACE AS EQUIPPLACE, P.CENOTE AS CENOTE FROM CONTRACT_EQUIP P LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO CI2 ON P.MANUFACTURER = CI2.ID LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO CI3 ON P.VNDR = CI3.ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS DICT ON P.DEVICE_TYPE = DICT.ID_ WHERE P.CONTRACT_ID='{contract_id}'
